en.body_template: BPI authorization failed for Cable Modem {{mac}}{% if sid %} SID {{sid}}{% endif %}{% if interface %} on interface {{interface}}{% endif %}
en.probable_causes: An unauthorized cable modem has been deleted to enforce BPI authorization for the specified cable modem. The specified cable modem was not performing BPI negotiation.
en.recommended_actions: Check the modem interface configuration for privacy mandatory, or check for errors in the TFTP configuration file.
